title: My Teams
body: Riot, you need to fix the skill level which i get matched up with. You cannot expect me to carry the adc who went 0/5, the top laner who went even worse and the jg who went the same. What have i done wrong to have these players who feed every single game. i haven't won more that 2 games over this entire week even after i go 4/0 by the end of laning phase. I mean seriously.

replies.body:
>You cannot expect me to carry

You aren't, though. It's inevitable that you'll lose some games which were just out of your control. If you never lost a game, then what would the point be in playing?

>What have i done wrong to have these players who feed every single game.

It can seem like that at times, but the way the MMR system works ensures that you're matched with players roughly of your skill-level. The only way to subvert this is if you were always using a premade, in which case it becomes a personal matter.

>even after i go 4/0 by the end of laning phase.

Score is not everything. It only indicates how strong *your* character is, not every other player on your team (which constitutes 4/5 of it).

If you find yoursellf with a lead and your team-mates falling behind, try to help them get their lead back. Stick around them and kill the enemies who come in for the kill. If it's well past the laning phase and it's really only team-fights, then you can play a good split-pushing champ and split-push your way to victory, while your team is losing a significant battle.

For more gameplay and strategy tips, head on over to the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) boards.
